meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by arboviruses.
meanings.sent1: The arboviral outbreak affected many people in the area.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying the arboviral infection to find a cure.
meanings.sent3: The arboviral mosquitoes threw a party in the stagnant water.
meanings.sent4: The arboviral spread of rumors was unstoppable.
meanings.sent5: The arboviral nature of the disease made it difficult to contain.

meanings.definition: Transmitted by arthropods, such as mosquitoes or ticks.
meanings.sent1: The arboviral disease was carried by mosquitoes to new regions.
meanings.sent2: Preventing arboviral infections involves controlling insect populations.
meanings.sent3: The arboviral mosquitoes had a secret handshake for transmitting diseases.
meanings.sent4: The arboviral transmission of information spread rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The arboviral link between mosquitoes and diseases was well-known.
